org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors

类 PressureModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors.SensorModel
      • org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors.PressureModel

  • public class PressureModel
extends SensorModel
    PressureModel keeps the internal data model behind Pressure Sensor.
    作者:
    ilarele
